name: Opposable Eating Habits
description:
This is a more full realization of a game I did for a 3 hour jam called "3 hour opposite". There were a lot of things I wanted to do but didn't have the time for so I decided to extend the project and finish it the way I wanted it to be. 

The current total development time is 5 hours 15 minutes. I'm aiming to get all the features I want in within 8-10 hours of development. 

Music by Erandi Huipe. Visit his Soundcloud here : https://soundcloud.com/xarhini
